commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Link to shellcheck install instructions from Validate Syntax command
commits.body: This is when shellcheck is not found on your system.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Show “OK” when there are no errors/warnings

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add Validate Syntax to shell script bundle (<kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃⇧V</kbd>)
commits.body:
This uses “shellcheck” so you must have this command in your PATH or set TM_SHELLCHECK.

Also made moved around a few items in the shell script bundle’s menu.
